765240.name: Daydream
765240.description:
Daydream is a unique time based game set in the dreams of a child. Every world in the game features challenges in different environments and music to spice up the feel.

Dreams in this game provides a vast range of environments that range from a fairy tale theme to space gravity, burning forest to depth of ocean, colorful gates to zodiac signs! The end result will be a vivid, colorful memory of a young indie game.




    Features:

  • Guaranteed 60 FPS in entire gameplay.
  • Highly optimized for multi-core PC with very low resource usage. Provides more gameplay hours on laptops.
  • Randomly generated interaction for replay value.
  • In game achievements system. (More will be added with updates)
  • Touch screen laptops and other touch screens optimized!

In any case Direct X 2010 June redistributable is needed to work. This will prevent any struggle with crashes.
